newsitem.title: LATVIA: LATVIA-INVESTMENT BANK SAYS PLANS LAT BONDS.
newsitem.headline: LATVIA-INVESTMENT BANK SAYS PLANS LAT BONDS.

text.p: The Latvian Investment Bank said on Thursday it is working on an open issue of lat bonds, to become the first Latvian bank to issue bonds locally.
"We are at the moment working on an open lat bond issue," an Investment Bank official told Reuters.
He refused to give any details until a press release is issued later today.
Securities commission deputy chairman Talis Linkaitis said the Investment Bank has already registered the issue prospectus.
Salaspils municipality bond and Finnish Merita Bank are the other two issuers of lat bonds.
Investment Bank is an institution of the Latvian government and the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) which channels loans to medium and small size businesses.
